title: The Huge adventures of Trevor a cat; Trevor Island
creator_credit: John Taylor and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: A combination of two animated films by John Taylor. “The Huge adventures of Trevor, a cat”. Trevor has his hunting instincts revived when he accidentally catches a bird. Encouraged by his success Trevor sets his sights even higher with disastrous and hilarious results. “Trevor Island” Trevor’s family move to a tropical island and decide to set up an airport and car park. A sedate lifestyle, however, is not to Trevor’s liking.
